amendment.description: An amendment numbered 115 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit funds from being used to fund any grant related to any transgenic edible vaccine.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A058) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A058) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A058) Agreed to by voice vote.
